alert.note: Alert for Las Animas (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 2:25PM MDT until July 20 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Las Animas County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 300 PM MDT. * At 225 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Gulnare to 8 miles northwest of Segundo to 11 miles south of Stonewall, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Torrential rainfall, 60 mph wind gusts, and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Trinidad, Aguilar, Cokedale, Starkville, Gulnare, Boncarbo, Segundo, Hoehne and Weston. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
